vehicle_protection.title: Vehicle Protection
vehicle_protection.description: CDW and LDW insurance cover damage from collisions, theft, or accidents during the rental period.

third_party.title: Third Party Protection
third_party.description: ALI and SLI protection for third-party vehicles involved in collisions with your rental car.

deposit.title: Security Deposit
deposit.description: A security deposit is required which is blocked on your card and released upon return of the vehicle.

extras.title: Optional Extras
extras.description: You can add extras to your reservation such as GPS and baby or child seats. Add them now so you don't have to worry about it during your trip!

additional_driver.title: Additional Driver
additional_driver.description: If someone else will also be driving the car, they must sign the contract as an additional driver and meet the requirements for renting a car such as: necessary documentation and minimum driving age.

mileage.title: Mileage
mileage.description: Check if your reservation includes unlimited mileage or not. Unlimited mileage means you can drive as much as you want without paying any extra for the kilometers driven.
